sentence.Network_en: We shall have to accept Comte's plea for a unified social science.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们要接受孔德要求建立统一社会科学的呼吁.

sentence.Network_en: It is in this sense that Comte repudiates empiricism.
sentence.Network_cn: 正是从这个意义上说,孔德抛弃了经验主义.

sentence.Network_en: Comte describes the historical method as specific to sociology.
sentence.Network_cn: 孔德称历史方法为社会学特有的方法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: franch 比雷, franche-comte 法兰斯——孔德, franch 法国

means.word_mean: 1. a former province of eastern France

auth_sentence.content: He was, like Napoleon in the eyes of Comte, an anachronism.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was, like Napoleon in the eyes of Comte, an anachronism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was, like Napoleon in the eyes of Comte, an anachronism.

auth_sentence.content: Confrontation "The police have better things to do than hunt veiled women," said Nicolas Comte from the SGP police union.
auth_sentence.res_content: Confrontation "The police have better things to do than hunt veiled women," said Nicolas Comte from the SGP police union.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Confrontation "The police have better things to do than hunt veiled women," said Nicolas Comte from the SGP police union.

auth_sentence.content: He married the Comte's daughter, Charlotte de Villermont, and they had two sons, Georges and Joseph.
auth_sentence.res_content: He married the Comte's daughter, Charlotte de Villermont, and they had two sons, Georges and Joseph.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He married the Comte's daughter, Charlotte de Villermont, and they had two sons, Georges and Joseph.
